charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] accompanied Naomi,
who was new to Pasio, on a walk around
the island.
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_0300:
It’s got a different kind of charm compared to the
ones back in Alola!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_0400: Thanks for showing me around today!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_0500:
I’ve learned a lot about Pasio thanks to
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_0600: Pasio sure is a wonderful place!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_0700: I’m sure my Sandslash agrees too!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_0302_1000: You two are kind of alike!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_0402_1100:
That might be because we’ve been together for
so long.
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1200:
I met Sandslash back in my hometown, and since
then, we’ve been by each other’s side.
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1400: There is one thing that concerns me, though...
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1500:
Sandslash loves to climb trees. Whenever we’re at
a forest while traveling, she’ll start climbing!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1600:
She offers me the Berries she gets from shaking
the trees, but...
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1700:
Sometimes, Pokémon fall out of the trees along
with the Berries!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_1900:
But I mix the fallen Berries into curry or use them
to make Pokéblocks and Poffins.
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2000:
We actually did pretty well participating in
Pokémon contests in both Hoenn and Sinnoh!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2100:
Oooh, that reminds me of all the memories
Sandslash and I had together!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2200:
As we travel, we gain Travel Exp. from
all around!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2700:
You know how every region has exclusive local
specialties you can’t experience anywhere else?
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2800:
Travel Exp. is what you earn when you find
those experiences.
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_2900:
We’re going to earn as much Travel Exp. as
possible and become the best travelers in
the world!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_3000:
So, why don’t you tell me about what Pasio is
famous for?
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_0401_3200:
Artificial... You mean like mechanical? I bet using
machines to train would be super effective!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_0402_3400:
I see... So to get the full Pasio experience, I need
to deepen my connection with Sandslash!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_3600: Oh yeah! You should share your socials with me!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_0402_4000: What?! Don’t tease me like that!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_4100: I’ll tell you mine first, OK?
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_4200: Now to take a commemorative selfie!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_4300: Here we go! Strike a pose!
charaepi_ch0651_78_nanase/2301_1201_4400:
Hehe! Looks like I’ve made another
awesome memory!
